3: No need for formalities. Sit down.
All of you present are Commandants who have passed the APUS mock training with flying colors, so I'll cut to the chase.
What awaits you next is an actual combat mission.
As you all know, Babylonia has been engaged in tactical warfare with forces on the surface...
And the effort to reclaim deserted urban areas in good conditions is well underway...
So, the next step is to send all of you to areas near where those forces are based.
There you will find strongholds on the brink of collapsing. And those forces are too preoccupied to do anything about them.
To use Babylonia as a bridge to reconnect the human strongholds driven apart by the virus.
That's it. Celica will have additional information regarding the strongholds you've been assigned to. Dismissed!
